name: Clivio
description:
Help Clivio become taller than his evil brother Clevio, by stacking crowns on top of Clivio's pointy head!

Clivio is a puzzle game based on colored barriers and a color-changing body.

I made this short game over the course of a few days for an academy project, using only Unity's visual scripting. I hope you like it :D

CONTROLS:

WASD: Movement

Enter: Next/skip dialog

Esc: Quit game
